text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1993. ==Events== *3 April - Tommy Seebach Band are selected to represent Denmark at the 1993 Eurovision Song Contest with their song "Under stjernerne på himlen". They are selected to be the twenty-sixth Danish Eurovision entry during Dansk Melodi Grand Prix held at the Odense Kongrescenter in Odense. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *1993 in Denmark
title: 1993 in Danish television
